attributes.action: introduce the recycling of disposable baby and adult nappies as they do in Canada and Holland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lack of landfill is an increasing problem in this country, hence the increase in landfill tax during the latest budget.A large proportion of landfill is due to disposable nappies, please note that disposable nappies are not just used for babies but also for some adults. We know that disposable nappies can take about 100years to decompose so instead of burying them why not recycle them as is done in Canada and in the Netherlands. 
"October 2001 the Dutch ministry of the environment introduced a directive obliging health care institutes and municipalities to recycle diapers wherever the technology exists"
